name: Hat Man (Joe Capo)
description:
Hat Man is a monster shadow creature that appears to people during sleep paralysis. He is said to be unhappy about troubled families and he will choke you to death if he is mad at you. Can you escape the nightmare?
WILL you?

Arrow Keys to Move, square to enter fullscreen...

Find the Exit...

Don't get lost!..

Uh and yeah the game has a lot of fast flashing images and loud noises.
